alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison County through 615 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms along and northeast of a line extending from 20 miles southeast of Dillon to 26 miles north of Monida. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Ennis, Alder, Pony, Norris, Mcallister, Jeffers, Laurin and Cameron. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 27 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for south central and southwestern Montana.
